extendedInfo.description: Check out the paid version of this app on the Android market.  The app is only $0.99 and contains an updated user interface with easier navigable tabs, updated theme songs and no advertisements! The theme songs from all your favorite animated TV shows.  Relive your childhood with great hits including DuckTales, Doug, Inspector Gadget, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles and many more!-To save songs as notifications, ringtones or alarms, simply perform a long press on the buttons and select the appropriate item.  To set the song use the options menu for the notification sound you are trying to set.-To set as your default ringtone perform a long click on the button and select "Save as default ringtone"  -To stop a song from playing click the song's button again.If you notice any of your favorite songs are missing, just let us know!Note:Due to the large number of song requests, this application has gotten quite large.  It is as small as I can get it without entirely losing the sound quality.  If you experience any issues, try installing the app through a wifi connection.I can not respond to comments so if you are experiencing an issue, please send me an email and I will be happy to help you out. Also, for song requests, please email me.  Some requests that are made in the comments are for songs that are on other RocTech Mobile apps and I can't respond to you on there.  Thanks!

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I LOVE it! This app has almost everything I was looking for plus a ton! I was looking for Shirt Tales, but this was a nice find too. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Such fun!
reviews.comment: Love this and all the other TV theme apps as well. Easy to set up and no obtrusive ads. Thank you so much.
reviews.author: Susann Cuperus

reviews.title: My childhood condensed.
reviews.comment: Almost all the songs are of fantastic quality, and there are a TON of them. A childhood flashback every time I play one. I love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: I love that you have tiny toons and animaniacs....and I\'m so happy I just found pinky and the brain!!!!! Quality could be better on some of the songs, and I would like to be able to share them as well!!!!
reviews.author: Katrina Winchell

reviews.comment: Love it!! Can you add pb & j otter and out of the box?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is awesome!! Brings back old memories.
reviews.comment: Any chance you could put on Count Duckula, Super Mario World, Beetlejuice
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful....just awful
reviews.comment: Crappy recordings sounded terrible
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Great selection of theme songs! Some I have not heard since I was a child like the racoons! Thinking I may need to purchase the full version.
reviews.author: Travis Patterson

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: So many classic cartoon show songs and very well-known ones at that. Love the variety! Totally takes me back to being a kid. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cartoons
reviews.comment: This app brings back wonderful memories.
reviews.author: Todd Hansard

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: The sound quality on alot of the songs are bad but the choices are really good! Maybe u can add Muppet babies and power rangers?
reviews.author: Star Scott

reviews.title: Good but needs more...
reviews.comment: Attack of the killer tomatoes....dino riders....he man....plenty more you can add...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: I love this app. It brings such good childhood memories. Cartoons now a days are NOT like they use to be. These were cartoons of good versus bad, it taught u stuff. With the new cartoons they have now I feel dumb by the minute. No point to them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hell yeah!
reviews.comment: Thanks so much. Works great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Just need a few more tones to get the full 5.
reviews.author: Matthew Linson

reviews.title: Awesome ringtones
reviews.comment: They just aren\'t loud enough at max volume.
reviews.author: Crimson Orchid

reviews.title: Great app!!!!
reviews.comment: They have so many, and pretty good quality too. They\'re easy to save so all my friends have their own themed ringer. I just wish they had multiples, like all the different openers dbz used or pokemon through the years
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: I found something worth keeping..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.comment: Pinky and the Brain, Inspector Gadget, GI Joe, She-Ra....all worth it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs
reviews.comment: Awesome i love tmnt, sonic the hedghog, spongebob, and inspector gadget. But you could use fairly odd parents, garfield, and the other tmnt songs
reviews.author: Nicholas Stevens
